str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To thirst for, desire earnestly. From a variation of dipsos; to thirst for.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A fountain, spring, well, issue, flow. Probably from pegnumi; a fount, i.e. Source or supply.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: To leap, leap up; of water: To spring up, bubble up.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
From aion; perpetual.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
